data.title: Marconi Memorabilia - Museum of the History of Science
data.meta_description: An exhibition of memorabilia from the Marconi Collection to mark the centenary of the award of the Nobel Prize for Physics to Guglielmo Marconi in 1909. In the Entrance Gallery.
data.meta_site_name: Museum of the History of Science
data.text:
Marconi Memorabilia

An exhibition of memorabilia from the Marconi Collection to mark the centenary of the award of the Nobel Prize for Physics to Guglielmo Marconi in 1909. In the Entrance Gallery.
